profile.title: Profile
profile.name: Pablo López
profile.aboutMe: I am a passionate Machine Learning Engineer with a particular interest in developing MLOps pipelines to deliver models at large scale. When I have time, I also enjoy developing web apps using modern front end frameworks. I am also an avid reader of fiction and fantasy books!

experience.title: Education & Experience
experience.subtitle: How did I get to where I am today?

list.title: MSc Artificial Intelligence with Speech and Multimodal Interaction, Graduated with Distinction
list.description: Learned AI foundations, data mining and machine learning techniques. I also used applied statistics to solve business problems. I worked in teams to complete projects including using swarm algorithms (PSO) to optimise the parameters of a neural network and building a conversational agent to assist older adults. Finally, I completed my thesis as part of an industrial placement in UserTesting

list.title: Machine Learning Engineer Nanodegree
list.description: With this nanodegree I've learned the core concepts of Machine learning, including Supervised, Unsupervised, Reinforcement and Deep Learning. During this course I've had the chance to complete several real-world projects to apply what I've learned using scikit-learn, keras, tensorflow and several other machine learning libraries. The capstone project I chose to do was a Reinforcement Learning algorithm that could play the Atari game Space Invaders.

list.title: PyTorch Scholarship Challenge from Facebook
list.description: During this challenge I had the opportunity to learn Deep Learning foundations as well as learning about and building Fully Connected Neural Nets, CNNs and LSTMs with pytorch. For the final project I built a flower classification model that identifies a flower species given an image.

list.title: Developer
list.description: Full time developer in my spare time. During this time I've specialized in Javascript and front-end frameworks like React, Angular, and Backbone. I've also explored back end technologies like node.js and NoSQL databases like MongoDB, as well as some PHP and SQL. I've also had the opportunity to learn other languages like Java where I've developed simple apps and Python where I've had the chance to build modern AI models like CNNs and LSTMs.

list.title: HND Software Development
list.description: The education was mainly Java-based programming, but I also learned about SQL, PHP, MVC and more. During my time in college I've learned the importance of OOP, web and user experience and design.

list.title: Degree in Commerce
list.description: Graduated with honors. During this time I participated in the Erasmus+ program studying in Düsseldorf for an academic year.

list.title: Machine Learning Engineer
list.description: Built an end-to-end MLOps pipeline to support deploying multiple models for a different projects. I also researched trained and deployed multiple models to production for a unique problem space. Finally, I continously pushed to improve and refactor the existing codebase to use best engineering practices.

list.title: Data Scientist
list.description: Developed an NLP model to detect participants who answered screener questions inconsistently. Built a web inteface for the model to enable the QA team to detect fraudulent users.

list.title: Project Leader
list.description: Organised and participated in the Mongol Rally: the longest charity rally in the world. We managed to get funding from 7 different sponsors and raised £1,000 for the charity AIPC Pandora. Blog: https://www.facebook.com/wanderdustproject

abilities.title: Skills
abilities.subtitle: All the skills I've gained in the past years.

projects.title: Melanoma Detection
